eventinfo: Claims Innovation USA 2022 (July 11th-13th) Promises to bring you the cutting edge in claims intelligence with a carefully curated agenda designed to allow insurance carriers at all stages of maturity develop solutions to their most pressing claims challenges. Join over 1000 of your US claims colleagues and partners for 2 days of virtual content followed by an in-person gathering in the heart of Chicago. You'll hear business-critical insights on how to deliver a seamless customer experience, improve employee retention and advancement as well as driving further operational and cost efficiencies.
orgProfile: Intelligent Insurer is essential reading for buyers, capital providers and brokers of reinsurance and wholesale insurance. Our readers include senior executives at insurers, reinsurers, brokers and their advisors, who are responsible for driving the market forward through their innovation and experience.

eventinfo: Commercial Lines Innovation Europe (October 4–5, London) is the only event on the insurance calendar dedicated to the future of commercial insurance. Over two days you’ll meet 250+ commercial insurers to discuss how macroeconomic trends—war, inflation, ESG, energy prices, supply chain, cyber— are impacting commercial lines of business. And you’ll get a roadmap for transformation for the era of data, technology and innovation, all delivered by experts pioneering new approaches in underwriting, distribution and operations. No other insurance event features so many C-level speakers, focused purely on commercial lines. You’ll hear from such companies as Zurich, AXA XL, RSA, AGCS, Helvetia, Chubb, HDI Global SE, Sompo International, Helvetia, Howden and more. They’ll be sharing their expertise on emerging risks and provide strategies to help customers achieve resilience in a volatile risk landscape. Wherever you sit in the commercial lines ecosystem, you’ll benefit from industry-leading content and an unrivalled networking experience that will future-proof your organisation.
